author: cschoett
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-1067, added additional check for ControlReference value types.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-37: Add ClusterStatus.  Contributed by Owen O'Malley.

author: ltheussl
msg: Introduced new -noinit goals for all goals that are called internally
while keeping the same behavior of goals that existed before.
This is not very pretty, but I guess xdoc:init is a special case.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MCLEAN-4] Adding flag followSymLinks which defaults to false, and will cause the clean mojo to detect symbolic links and either traverse them when deleting, or (by default) simply delete the links.
